verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

When a <S%H120>man<s%> shall have in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> a <S%H7613>rising<s%>, a <S%H5597>scab<s%>, or bright <S%H934>spot<s%>, and it be in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> like the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>; then he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, or unto <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>: rising: or, swelling

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>: and when the <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>, and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> in <S%H4758>sight<s%> be <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, it is a <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on him, and pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.

If the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> be <S%H3836>white<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and in <S%H4758>sight<s%> be not <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and the <S%H8181>hair<s%> thereof be not <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> up him that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on him the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: and, behold, if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight<s%> be at a <S%H5975>stay<s%>, and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> not in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8145>more<s%>:

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on him <S%H8145>again<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: and, behold, if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be somewhat <S%H3544>dark<s%>, and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> not in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%>: it is but a <S%H4556>scab<s%>: and he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

But if the <S%H4556>scab<s%> spread <S%H6581>much<s%> <S%H6581>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that he hath been <S%H7200>seen<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%>, he shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H8145>again<s%>:

And if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> that, behold, the <S%H4556>scab<s%> <S%H6581>spreadeth<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>.
When the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> is in a <S%H120>man<s%>, then he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>;

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> him: and, behold, if the <S%H7613>rising<s%> be <S%H3836>white<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and it have <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>, and there be <S%H4241>quick<s%> <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H7613>rising<s%>; quick: Heb. the quickening of living flesh

It is an <S%H3462>old<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>, and shall not <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up: for he is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

And if a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> break <S%H6524>out<s%> <S%H6524>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> all the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of him that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%> from his <S%H7218>head<s%> even to his <S%H7272>foot<s%>, wheresoever the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H4758>looketh<s%> <S%H5869><s%>;

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>consider<s%>: and, behold, if the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> have <S%H3680>covered<s%> all his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, he shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%> that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%>: it is all <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>: he is <S%H2889>clean<s%>.
But <S%H3117>when<s%> <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7200>appeareth<s%> in him, he shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and pronounce him to be <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: for the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>: it is a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>.
Or if the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> turn <S%H7725>again<s%>, and be <S%H2015>changed<s%> unto <S%H3836>white<s%>, he shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>;

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> him: and, behold, if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H3836>white<s%>; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%> that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%>: he is <S%H2889>clean<s%>.
The <S%H1320>flesh<s%> also, in <S%H3588>which<s%>, even in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> thereof, was a <S%H7822>boil<s%>, and is <S%H7495>healed<s%>,

And in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7822>boil<s%> there be a <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H7613>rising<s%>, or a bright <S%H934>spot<s%>, <S%H3836>white<s%>, and somewhat <S%H125>reddish<s%>, and it be <S%H7200>shewed<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%>;

And if, when the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%> it, behold, it be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H8217>lower<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and the <S%H8181>hair<s%> thereof be <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>; the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is a <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H6524>broken<s%> out of the <S%H7822>boil<s%>.

But if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> on it, and, behold, there be no <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H8181>hairs<s%> therein, and if it be not <S%H8217>lower<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, but be somewhat <S%H3544>dark<s%>; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:
And if it spread <S%H6581>much<s%> <S%H6581>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is a <S%H5061>plague<s%>.

But if the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> <S%H5975>stay<s%> in his place, and <S%H6581>spread<s%> not, it is a <S%H6867>burning<s%> <S%H7822>boil<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

Or if there be any <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> whereof there is a <S%H784>hot<s%> <S%H4348>burning<s%>, and the <S%H4241>quick<s%> flesh that <S%H4348>burneth<s%> have a <S%H3836>white<s%> bright <S%H934>spot<s%>, somewhat <S%H125>reddish<s%>, or <S%H3836>white<s%>; a hot: Heb. a burning of fire

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> upon it: and, behold, if the <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> be <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>, and it be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>; it is a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H6524>broken<s%> out of the <S%H4348>burning<s%>: wherefore the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>.

But if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> on it, and, behold, there be no <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the bright <S%H934>spot<s%>, and it be no <S%H8217>lower<s%> than the other <S%H5785>skin<s%>, but be somewhat <S%H3544>dark<s%>; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> upon him the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: and if it be spread <S%H6581>much<s%> <S%H6581>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>.

And if the <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot<s%> <S%H5975>stay<s%> in his place, and <S%H6581>spread<s%> not in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, but it be somewhat <S%H3544>dark<s%>; it is a <S%H7613>rising<s%> of the <S%H4348>burning<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%>: for it is an <S%H6867>inflammation<s%> of the <S%H4348>burning<s%>.
If a <S%H376>man<s%> or <S%H802>woman<s%> have a <S%H5061>plague<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> or the <S%H2206>beard<s%>;

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%>: and, behold, if it be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>; and there be in it a <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%>; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean<s%>: it is a dry <S%H5424>scall<s%>, even a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> or <S%H2206>beard<s%>.

And if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of the <S%H5424>scall<s%>, and, behold, it be not in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and that there is no <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> in it; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> up him that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of the <S%H5424>scall<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

And in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%>: and, behold, if the <S%H5424>scall<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> not, and there be in it no <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%>, and the <S%H5424>scall<s%> be not in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>;

He shall be <S%H1548>shaven<s%>, but the <S%H5424>scall<s%> shall he not <S%H1548>shave<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> up him that hath the <S%H5424>scall<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8145>more<s%>:

And in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5424>scall<s%>: and, behold, if the <S%H5424>scall<s%> be not <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, nor be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%>; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%>: and he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and be <S%H2891>clean<s%>.
But if the <S%H5424>scall<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H6581>much<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%>;

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on him: and, behold, if the <S%H5424>scall<s%> be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall not <S%H1239>seek<s%> for <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%>; he is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

But if the <S%H5424>scall<s%> be in his <S%H5869>sight<s%> at a <S%H5975>stay<s%>, and that there is <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> <S%H6779>grown<s%> up therein; the <S%H5424>scall<s%> is <S%H7495>healed<s%>, he is <S%H2889>clean<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%>.
If a <S%H376>man<s%> also or a <S%H802>woman<s%> have in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> bright <S%H934>spots<s%>, even <S%H3836>white<s%> bright <S%H934>spots<s%>;

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>: and, behold, if the bright <S%H934>spots<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> be <S%H3544>darkish<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%>; it is a freckled <S%H933>spot<s%> that <S%H6524>groweth<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>; he is <S%H2889>clean<s%>.
And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3588><s%> whose hair is <S%H4803>fallen<s%> off his <S%H7218>head<s%>, he is <S%H7142>bald<s%>; yet is he <S%H2889>clean<s%>. hair: Heb. head is pilled
And he that hath his hair <S%H4803>fallen<s%> off from the <S%H6285>part<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> toward his <S%H6440>face<s%>, he is forehead <S%H1371>bald<s%>: yet is he <S%H2889>clean<s%>.

And if there be in the bald <S%H7146>head<s%>, or bald <S%H1372>forehead<s%>, a <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H125>reddish<s%> <S%H5061>sore<s%>; it is a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H6524>sprung<s%> up in his bald <S%H7146>head<s%>, or his bald <S%H1372>forehead<s%>.

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> upon it: and, behold, if the <S%H7613>rising<s%> of the <S%H5061>sore<s%> be <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H125>reddish<s%> in his bald <S%H7146>head<s%>, or in his bald <S%H1372>forehead<s%>, as the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H4758>appeareth<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>;

He is a <S%H6879>leprous<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, he is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>: the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>utterly<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%>; his <S%H5061>plague<s%> is in his <S%H7218>head<s%>.

And the <S%H6879>leper<s%> in whom the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is, his <S%H899>clothes<s%> shall be <S%H6533>rent<s%>, and his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H6544>bare<s%>, and he shall put a <S%H5844>covering<s%> upon his upper <S%H8222>lip<s%>, and shall <S%H7121>cry<s%>, <S%H2931>Unclean<s%>, <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

All the <S%H3117>days<s%> wherein the <S%H5061>plague<s%> shall be in him he shall be <S%H2930>defiled<s%>; he is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>: he shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%>; <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> shall his <S%H4186>habitation<s%> be.
The <S%H899>garment<s%> also that the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> is in, whether it be a <S%H6785>woollen<s%> <S%H899>garment<s%>, or a <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H899>garment<s%>;

Whether it be in the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or <S%H6154>woof<s%>; of <S%H6593>linen<s%>, or of <S%H6785>woollen<s%>; whether in a <S%H5785>skin<s%>, or in any thing <S%H4399>made<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>; thing: Heb. work of

And if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H3422>greenish<s%> or <S%H125>reddish<s%> in the <S%H899>garment<s%>, or in the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, <S%H176>either<s%> in the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or in the <S%H6154>woof<s%>, or in any <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>; it is a <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>, and shall be <S%H7200>shewed<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>: thing: Heb. vessel, or, instrument
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> upon the <S%H5061>plague<s%>, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> up it that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

And he shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H899>garment<s%>, either in the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or in the <S%H6154>woof<s%>, or in a <S%H5785>skin<s%>, or in any <S%H4399>work<s%> that is <S%H6213>made<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>; the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is a <S%H3992>fretting<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>; it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

He shall therefore <S%H8313>burn<s%> that <S%H899>garment<s%>, whether <S%H8359>warp<s%> or <S%H6154>woof<s%>, in <S%H6785>woollen<s%> or in <S%H6593>linen<s%>, or any <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>, wherein the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is: for it is a <S%H3992>fretting<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>; it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>, and, behold, the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be not <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H899>garment<s%>, <S%H176>either<s%> in the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> in the <S%H6154>woof<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> in any <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>;

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> that they <S%H3526>wash<s%> the thing wherein the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is, and he shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> it up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8145>more<s%>:

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that it is <S%H3526>washed<s%>: and, behold, if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> have not <S%H2015>changed<s%> his <S%H5869>colour<s%>, and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be not <S%H6581>spread<s%>; it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%>; thou shalt <S%H8313>burn<s%> it in the <S%H784>fire<s%>; it is <S%H6356>fret<s%> inward, whether it be bare <S%H7146>within<s%> or <S%H1372>without<s%>. whether: Heb. whether it be bald in the head thereof, or in the forehead thereof

And if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%>, and, behold, the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be somewhat <S%H3544>dark<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3526>washing<s%> of it; then he shall <S%H7167>rend<s%> it out of the <S%H899>garment<s%>, or out of the <S%H5785>skin<s%>, or out of the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or out of the <S%H6154>woof<s%>:

And if it <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> in the <S%H899>garment<s%>, either in the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or in the <S%H6154>woof<s%>, or in any <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>; it is a <S%H6524>spreading<s%> plague: thou shalt <S%H8313>burn<s%> that wherein the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And the <S%H899>garment<s%>, either <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or <S%H6154>woof<s%>, or whatsoever <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%> it be, which thou shalt <S%H3526>wash<s%>, if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H5493>departed<s%> from them, then it shall be <S%H3526>washed<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> time, and shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>.

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in a <S%H899>garment<s%> of <S%H6785>woollen<s%> or <S%H6593>linen<s%>, either in the <S%H8359>warp<s%>, or <S%H6154>woof<s%>, or any <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skins<s%>, to pronounce it <S%H2891>clean<s%>, or to pronounce it <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.
